Drift Welcome Function

{% raw %}

drift_welcome[source]

drift_welcome(name='a mysterious user')

This functiontakes a name (string) and returns a personalized greeting!

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
drift_welcome("Stanley")

"Drift says 'Hello' to Stanley"
{% endraw %}
